name: View Global Variable
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Displays the current value of a global variable (from Settings) in a popup. Useful for debugging secrets or pooled variables.

properties.label: loc.prop_view_global_variable_label
properties.description: The global variable from Settings to view.

output_schema.name: data.inspected_variable_name
output_schema.description: The name of the global variable that was inspected.

output_schema.name: data.inspected_variable_value
output_schema.description: The current value of the inspected global variable.
